resources.string: "Database error."
"The start index is within an existing mileage"
"Stop/New index is within an existing mileage"
"New mileage overlap an existing mileage"
"Stop/New index must be greater than start index"
"Conversion rate already exist"
"Error on creating record!"
"Invalid date/time format!"
"This driver can not be deleted because it is used in mileage(s)."
"This driver can not be deleted because it is used in refuel(s)."
"This car can not be deleted because it is used in mileage(s)."
"This car can not be deleted because it is used in refuel(s)."
"This UOM can not be deleted because it is used in mileage(s)."
"This UOM can not be deleted because it is used in refuel(s)."
"This UOM can not be deleted because it is used in UOM conversion(s)."
"This currency can not be deleted because it is used in car definition(s)."
"This currency can not be deleted because it is used in refuel(s)."
"This expense type can not be deleted because it is used in mileage(s)."
"This expense type can not be deleted because it is used in refuel(s)."
"SDCARD not found. You can not create reports, gps tracks and database backups!"
"Report folder (/sdcard/andicar/reports) can not be created. You can not save the reports locally until you create this folder on your device."
"Can not create report file!"
"File writing error!"
"Backup folder (/sdcard/andicar/backup) can not be created. You can not backup your database until you create this folder on your device."
"The UOM can not be inactivated because it is used in an active car definition."
"The currency can not be inactivated because it is used in an active car definition."
"This category can not be deleted because it is used in refuel(s)."
"This category can not be deleted because it is used in expense(s)."
"The conversion rate is already defined between these currencies."
"This expense can not be deleted because it was created by a refuel.\nYou should delete the refuel."
"You can not define conversion between the same UOM's."
"You can not define conversion between the same currencies."
"GPS track folder (/sdcard/andicar/gpstrack) can not be created. You can not save the gps track files until you create this folder on your device."
"File system error!\nCheck your SDCARD."
"Invalid report."
"Track file not found!"
"Unknow car!\nIf this error persist, please report it at https://code.google.com/p/andicar/issues/entry"
